onAdLeftApplication().Description: Called when an ad leaves the application (e.g., to go to the browser).

onAdClosed().Description: Called when the user is about to return to the application after clicking on an ad.

onAdFailedToLoad(int).Description: Called when an ad request failed. The error code is usually @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#ERROR_CODE_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#ERROR_CODE_INVALID_REQUEST_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#ERROR_CODE_NETWORK_ERROR_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#ERROR_CODE_NO_FILL_E@.

onAdOpened().Description: Called when an ad opens an overlay that covers the screen.

onAdLoaded().Description: Called when an ad is received.

ClassDesc: A listener for receiving notifications during the lifecycle of an ad.
